An Amazon business course could also be suitable for Nepali learners who are interested in starting a side hustle or building an online business as a source of income. Overall, an Amazon business course could be suitable for a wide range of Nepali learners, including entrepreneurs, small business owners, e-commerce professionals, and anyone with an interest in starting an online business. It's important to choose a course that is tailored to your skill level and learning goals.
